reviews.review_text: I've taken 12 courses in this field, but this one stands out. The practical focus on session structure helped me pivot my entire business model. Within 6 weeks I had doubled my rates. The community support was incredible too.

Solid content overall, but I wish there was more on group coaching. The the ethics module module felt rushed compared to others. Still valuable, just expected more depth given the price point. Would recommend, but set expectations accordingly.

I've taken 12 courses in this field, but this one stands out. The practical focus on outcome measurement helped me pivot my entire business model. Within 3 months I had launched group programs. The community support was incredible too.

The instructor support was exceptional. the instructor personally answered my question about handling resistance within 24 hours. The peer discussion forum helped me troubleshoot real client scenarios. Never felt alone in the learning process.
Decent course. The Module 2 module was fantastic, but Module 6 didn't deliver as much value. Wanted more interactive elements. Still learned enough to justify the cost, but room for improvement.

As someone with a background in nursing, I appreciated the academic rigor. The integration of cognitive-behavioral and motivational interviewing approaches was brilliant. This isn't just 'coaching tips' — it's legitimate professional training.

Best professional investment I've made in years. The clear explanations made complex topics accessible, and I immediately applied goal-setting framework with my first client post-certification. Revenue up 104% in 2 months. Worth every penny.

The depth of research behind this curriculum is impressive. Every claim backed by peer-reviewed studies, which builds massive credibility with clients. The intake protocol has become my go-to for intake sessions. Thoroughly evidence-based.
ROI was insane. Paid for itself in 1 month after I landed my first {niche_client_type} client using the consultation model from Module 3. Now charging $283 per session vs $77 before. Game changer.

The instructor support was exceptional. the instructor personally answered my question about pricing my services within 24 hours. The private Facebook group helped me troubleshoot real client scenarios. Never felt alone in the learning process.

This certification completely transformed my practice. I was struggling to transition from general wellness coaching to Default, and this course gave me the exact framework I needed. The assessment framework module alone was worth the investment. Now I have 8 new clients and finally feel confident in my niche.

This certification completely transformed my practice. I was struggling to transition from fitness training to Default, and this course gave me the exact framework I needed. The assessment framework module alone was worth the investment. Now I have 9 new clients and finally feel confident in my niche.

Best professional investment I've made in years. The step-by-step breakdown made complex topics accessible, and I immediately applied progress tracker with my first client post-certification. Revenue up 81% in 90 days. Worth every penny.
